price: 15. Kaadu atu luk tcmeetem kalah tu- hinna, baxxaqqa iyya baab akke waytek kaak iyyen.
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālū in hādhā illā siḥ'run mubīnun
